Posts.EditableText:
I do...

Start commenting out code, and see where the error starts.
Then look over the code to see what's wrong.
Posts.HTML:
I do...

Start commenting out code, and see where the error starts.
Then look over the code to see what's wrong.

Posts.EditableText: By commenting, Tron means to put every other line print out (msg) what just happened, then see where the error is...
Posts.HTML: By commenting, Tron means to put every other line print out (msg) what just happened, then see where the error is...

Posts.EditableText:
No, that won't really help too much.

By commenting, I mean put a [b:i7omm5ha]'[/b:i7omm5ha] at the start of all the lines of code.. This means Quest skips over them..
Then uncomment one line at a time, until you find your error.
Posts.HTML:
No, that won't really help too much.

By commenting, I mean put a ' at the start of all the lines of code.. This means Quest skips over them..
Then uncomment one line at a time, until you find your error.
